resources.string:
* Explore the 9 square block area. 

 * In each linear block, please find and note at least one establishment that sells and/or serves food (e.g. restaurants, cafes, markets). 

 * If there are no such establishments on a block, please note that lack. 

 * The application will vibrate if you leave the boundary of the test area. 
 	Downtown Eugene: 8th Ave - 11th Ave, Charnelton St â€“ Oak St. Start on 10th between Olive and Willamette (Emx stop)

 * To make a note, please either take a picture of the building or a representative sign or record an audio clip describing the establishment, or do both (image and audio).
